## Vector2.distance() method

Calculates the distance between two Vector2's.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static distance(v1: Vector2, v2: Vector2): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v1 | [Vector2](doc/markdown/./base.vector2.md) | The first vector. |
|  v2 | [Vector2](doc/markdown/./base.vector2.md) | The second vector. |

**Returns:**

number

distance between v1 and v2
